title: Calories in Jasmine Rice Cooked
meta_description: Discover calories in jasmine rice cooked per cup and 100g, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition tweaks for your meals.
assumptions: White jasmine rice, cooked in water without added oil, salt, or seasonings; 1 cup ≈158g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cooking method, water absorption, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of cooked jasmine rice provides ~205 kcal and ~44 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Cook with 1 tsp butter per cup

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of cooked jasmine rice?
faqs.a: About 205 kcal for 1 cup (158g) plain cooked jasmine rice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in jasmine rice cooked?
faqs.a: Approximately 44g carbs per cup, mostly starch with low fiber.

faqs.q: Is jasmine rice cooked high in protein?
faqs.a: No, only ~4g protein per cup; it's primarily a carb source.

faqs.q: Calories in jasmine rice cooked per 100g?
faqs.a: Around 130 kcal per 100g of cooked jasmine rice.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in jasmine rice?
faqs.a: Yes—adding oil or butter increases calories; plain boiled is lowest.
